About Me

Let me tell you a few things..

BIO

I'm an Independent Artist a Choreographer, Dancer, Art Teacher and a professional Painting & Sketching Artist. I was introduced to Drawing in my childhood and ever since I have been furnishing my skills. I'm also a Choreographer and teaching students since I was 14 and I love to teach Dance because it allows me to connect with more and more people And making this world a little smaller from Yesterday.

Dancing

Hip-Hop & Bollywood Style Artist

By learning many different types of Dance forms on MSDI-Raipur, I have learned enough to Choreograph various Marriage and School functions. Though I learned many styles, my number-one passion is Hip-Hop.

Painting

Oil-Pastel Specialist

Painting is my Hobby as well as my Profession also. My mom discovered this talent of mine in my childhood and thus encouraged me to flourish this by sending me to YUNUS Art Gallery where I learned various Drawing styles.

Sketching

Portrait Making

I love Sketching eqally as Painting. I have learned Portrait making art And 3D-sketching art from YUNUS Art Gallery. I Have made various portrait till date But still A step behind from making Real life portraits.
